Created attachment 23605
Sample codo to reproduce the problem

When serving large files for download, lots of memory are used. This constantly leads to out of memory errors, requiring a server restart to release the used memory. (http://forums.sun.com/thread.jspa?threadID=5379231)

The attached code has been tested with JSF RI 1.2_12. The problem described doesn't happen with Glassfish V2 UR2.

As a workaround, I'm using a servlet for file download.

This isn't a Tomcat problem. Sorry.

After some exhaustive tests I found that the problem is with RichFaces org.ajax4jsf.Filter, which is mapped to the Faces Servlet.

https://jira.jboss.org/jira/browse/RF-7019
